title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Reverse throttling with Thrustmaster T 16000M
description:
Always wanted to know how you can use your joystick for reverse throttling? In that case have a quick look at this short video in which I will explain you how you can setup your joystick for this purpose. In the video we are focusing on the Thrustmaster T-16000M but this should be possible with most joysticks.
